select permission_name from role_permission a LEFT JOIN permission_menu b ON a.permission = b.permission_id where role_id = #{roleId}

select l.user_id 'userId' , u.name 'realName' ,u.branch_id 'branchId', b.branch_name 'branchName', l.role_id 'roleId', r.role_name 'roleName' from user_login l LEFT JOIN user_party_info u ON l.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN partybranch b ON b.branch_id = u.branch_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id = l.role_id where l.user_id = #{userId}
